summary: This code executes a command (here "ls") using io.popen and prints the result, using local instead of certain functions for improved efficiency.

details.comment: This code executes a command (here "ls") using io.popen and prints the result, using local instead of certain functions for improved efficiency.
details.content:
command ="ls"
handle = io.popen(command)
result = handle:read("*a")
handle:close()
-- use local instead of using some functions.
print (result)
